name: EcoBuddy
description:
What is EcoBuddy?

EcoBuddy tells the story of a group of animals from a zoo who want to know and experience an ecosystem from the "real" realm that is much different from a zoo. Will they find the world they are looking for? What obstacles will they face?

The full game features:

  • 3 different location story
  • Mini Games
  • Funfact

Early Childhood (eC)  and Everyone (E)

What's a visual novel?

A visual novel is a game with little traditional "gameplay." The player reads text on the screen, accompanied by visuals and audio, and follows through a set story. However, they can make choices to determine the story's route and the ending. Think of it as a choose-your-own-adventure book, except in a game (and with art and sound!).

On this page you will find  the demo version, which is free. We also have support for Windows,  -- just download the appropriate version for your system. Also, please note the rating of the version you download.
